historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 14-152, see notes following § 16-4801.

DC CODE § 16-4809

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: An individual entitled to notice under §§ 16-4501 through 16-4524 (the Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction Act) may challenge a standby guardianship designation order by initiating a child custody proceeding in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia or in any court that could exercise jurisdiction in accordance with §§ 16-4501 through 16-4524.
An order of custody issued by a court of competent jurisdiction supersedes any designation of standby guardianship.

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)
